alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hudspeth County through 500 PM MDT... At 427 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Sierra Blanca, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Finlay, Sunset Ranches and Round Top Mountain. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 91 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
